  • Constructor Details

    • Route

      public Route​(Island islandA, Island islandB)
      Creates a Route between two Islands.
      Parameters:
      islandA - the first Island on the Route.
      islandB - the destination Island on the Route.

  • Method Details

    • getIslandA

      public Island getIslandA()
      Returns:
      the first Island on the Route.

    • getIslandB

      public Island getIslandB()
      Returns:
      the second Island on the Route.

    • getRandomEvent

      public RandomEvent getRandomEvent()
      Returns:
      the RandomEvent associated with the Route.

    • getDistance

      public double getDistance()
      Returns:
      the distance from the first Island to the second Island on the Route.

    • getSailDuration

      public int getSailDuration​(Ship ship)
      Calculates how many days should be deducted from the days remaining in the game.
      Parameters:
      ship - the Ship chosen by the player.
      Returns:
      the amount of days to remove from the remaining days.

    • getSailCost

      public int getSailCost​(Ship ship)
      Calculates how much it will cost to pay the crew for one day.
      Parameters:
      ship - the Ship the player chose.
      Returns:
      the coins to be deducted from the Traders current total.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString​(Ship ship)
      Convert a Route object to a String
      Parameters:
      ship - the Ship chosen by the player.
      Returns:
      the Route object converted to a String.
